project_description: A simple Flutter application demonstrating the Cubit pattern for state management. The app shows a text with an icon (Cat and clock icon), and when clicked, it changes to Dog with a person icon.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modularized architecture using the Cubit pattern for state management. The app structure includes separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the Flutter application. Sets up the MaterialApp and provides the AnimalCubit using BlocProvider.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen widget which is the main screen of the app.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalCubit which manages the state of the animal text.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the animal between Cat and Dog.

files.name: lib/models/animal_model.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model which represents the animal state.

files.name: lib/widgets/animal_text_widget.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalTextWidget which displays the animal text and icon.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: The main screen of the app, displaying the AnimalTextWidget.

widgets.name: AnimalTextWidget
widgets.description: Displays the animal text and icon.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the animal text, toggling between Cat and Dog.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the animal between Cat and Dog.

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents the animal state with a name and an icon.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen: open app
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit: get current animal
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen: return animal state
HomeScreen -> AnimalTextWidget: display animal
User -> AnimalTextWidget: click
AnimalTextWidget -> AnimalCubit: toggleAnimal
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen: update state
HomeScreen -> AnimalTextWidget: display new animal
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed by the AnimalCubit, which toggles between 'Cat' and 'Dog' states. The HomeScreen subscribes to the AnimalCubit and updates the UI based on the current state.
navigation_flow: The app consists of a single screen (HomeScreen). When the user clicks on the text, the state is toggled and the UI is updated accordingly.
